verses.roman:
baḍa baḍa loka saba ānila bolāiyā
sabāre kahe śrīvāsa hāsiyā hāsiyā

synonyms: baḍa baḍa—respectable; loka—persons; saba—all; ānila—brought them; bolāiyā—causing to be called; sabāre—to everyone; kahe—addresses; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; hāsiyā hāsiyā—while smiling.
translation: Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura called for all the respectable gentlemen of the neighborhood and smilingly addressed them as follows.
